CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 12, 1957, pg. A1, reads: "Admiring Scroll - Pictured above are members of Lowell Perry's (he's the Steelers' end coach) family, as they admire a scroll of appreciation presented by the Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity before the Steelers-Brown game last Saturday. in picture are Maxine L. Perry, Lowell's wife; Mr. and Mrs. Frederick Wilson, his sister and brother-in-law (standing) Mrs. Lillian Perry, Lowell's mother, and Lowell Perry Jr. together with his famous dad. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait left to right, standing: Maxine L. Perry, Mrs. Wilson, Frederick Wilson; seated: Lowell Perry holding document inscribed "Scroll of Appreciation Alpha Omicron Lambda Chapter Lowell Perry End Coach - Pittsburgh Steelers 1957," Lowell Perry Jr., and Lillian Perry, gathered around chair
